summary: A simple re texture of Lord Haun\'s Magicka Sabers.
descriptionHtml:
ALL CREDIT GOES TO LORD HAUN AND HIS TEAM

Notice:
This is the basic saber hilt. Magicka Sabers now has movie-style ones available for download, but you may still desire the old hilt and you may use this with it.

Description:
When I first discovered the saber mod, I was very happy and appreciative of all the people involved with the project! Unfortunately I didn\'t like the default texture because of the leather-like hilt, so I made it black/grey. It was a very simple thing to do, but I\'m sure someone will benefit from me uploading this.

Once again, ALL credit should be given to Lord Haun/ his buddies. I merely changed a texture that he/ his buddies created for the pure motivation of benefiting the community. If you want to yell at me for uploading something so simple, have mercy on my soul!
author: NeighborlyNinja
